In just filed court papers Camille asks a judge to deny Kelsey Grammer 's request to dissolve their 13 year marriage while they continue battling over their 120 million dollar estate. Camille writes in the court papers, It is my understanding that( Kelsey Grammer ) is seeking to terminate the marriage solely for the reason that he intends to remarry as soon as possible. "I don't believe that is a sufficient reason to prejudice my rights to our estate. The Frasier star appeared on the Late Show with David Letterman Thursday night and sounded resolute about his plans for a quickie divorce from Camille, so he can tie the knot with Kayte Walsh soon. The Auburn Hills automaker sold 1.1 million cars and trucks in the U.S. last year. CEO Sergio Marchionne said last month that Chrysler expects to sell 2 million vehicles globally in 2011. They're looking at selling 1.5 million to 1.6 million vehicles in the U.S., said Bill Kelly, owner of Kelly Cars in Moon Township, Pa., near Pittsburgh. "And it's going to be less dependent on fleet sales." Fleet sales to rental companies

been inexcusable," Chrysler's chief executive, Sergio Marchionne , said in a conference call. " Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Michael Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson . Michael Jordan 's move worked: Jrue Holiday had 15 points, seven rebounds and six assists. He just put us in a good rhythm tonight and had us flowing, Allen Iverson said.
